entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New test xunit wrapper generator should produce errors when test method isn't public #74846
  • Mono Framework package is from an unidentified developer #74844
  • [CoreCLR Infrastructure] Improve diagnosability of Crossgen2 comparison job failures #74843
    8.0.0
  • Four crossgen-comparison jobs are failing regularly in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 outerloop runs #74842
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializableAttribute does not work with source generated properties #74841
  • `XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes` is ignored on writing `xmlns:*` attributes #74840
  • Failures in SSL Stream tests: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper. #74838
  • Thread Count dropping by 90% in .NET Core 3.1 Linux #74827
  • runtime - Source-build behavior control update #74819
  • [wasm] implement browser cache busting #74815
    8.0.0
  • Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F.VL #74813
    8.0.0
  • assert in ProcessWaitState on Linux arm64 #74795
    Future
  • wrong cookie parse #74794
  • Unexpected System.BadImageFormatException for an invocation of a static abstract method declared in a non-generic interface #74792

Closed

  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Security #72401
    7.0.0
  • How to install an ASP Core .NET 6 as windows service? #74759
  • Regression in the XmlBaseWriter.cs #74752
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Versioning #74733
    7.0.0
  • Typo in ClrEtwAll.man #74832
  • Incorrect behaviour of regex atomic groups #74722
  • Regex auto-atomicity too aggressive about \w and \b #74686
  • JsonConverter<IPAddress> fails to work #72393
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>[Range] #74824
  • Recommended Linux LLDB version #74790
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `test-main.js` needs an unhandled exception handler #73330
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Lock up at process shutdown on Windows when process has many threads #74678
    7.0.0
  • Helix test results are not getting uploaded for a lot of jobs #74699
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Ping.SendPingAsync` overloads with `CancellationToken` #67260
    Future
  • Distributed transactions: TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction doesn't work #74745
    7.0.0
  • Undo revert of Arcade update to ingest Workload Manifest task #71150
    6.0.8
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #72755
    Future
  • DataContractSerializer is not trimming safe #45559
    Future
  • [wasm] Enable crypto and related tests #37669
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: FormattableStringBuilder #74653
  • [QUIC] Long running test: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73377
    7.0.0
  • HttpListener Stack over flow #73674
    8.0.0
  • IDBFS is Not defined #74664
    8.0.0
  • incorrect computation of build parallelism #74691
  • Remove `% 0` workaround in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices` #65230
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Fix conservative stack reporting #74849
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix buffer overruns in GC code #74847
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Throw ArgumentException on unsupported tar entry type #74845
    area-System.IO
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #74839
    community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing ci improvements #74837
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Ignoring all protocol extension messages that are not supported on .net6 #74836
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update LifetimeTrackingHttpMessageHandler.cs #74833
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add host trace message to indicate runtimeconfig was not found #74829
    area-Host
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable #74828
    area-System.Transactions
  • [wasm] trim System.Private.Uri.dll #74826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Run code quality analyzers in the coreclr/tools directory #74825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74814
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix issue #74741 - assert failure during weak pointer scanning. #74810
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [iOS] Test against iOS 16 beta #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Fix `fgNoStructParamPromotion` #74807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #74792 (Roslyn issue 63617) #74804
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean up remnants of Crossgen1 from test scripts and pipelines #74803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] shorten JSInterop bench detection phase #74802
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable nullability warnings in JSON source generator #74801
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [ppc64le] Bug fixes #74800
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • appstart benchmark improvements #74799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Extensions.Logging.Console: Only check for Android/Apple mobile on netcoreapp configs #74798
    os-android, area-Extensions-Logging, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74796
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add a few more riscv64 stubs in PAL #74793
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid gate/worker thread creation failure stall the thread pool #74791
    area-System.Threading
  • Add WaitAsync functionality to Background Service #74789
    area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use current version of clang and llvm in Linux prereqs #74811
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Make possible to run debugger tests using runtime in debug mode #74830
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Unpin System.ValueTuple assembly version #74817
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74823
    area-System.Xml, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74821
    area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74772
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Linux armv6 build on runtime-community.yml #74757
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74787
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES file #74760
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74816
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][test] install handlers for unhandled exceptions on browser #74751
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish… #74769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: Fix helix test results reporting #74788
    blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74776
    area-System.Transactions
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74748
    area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move more legs out of runtime-staging #74783
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Updated

  • CI: Reduce the unrelated jobs running on wasm only PRs #74601
    area-Infrastructure
  • Sort out side of GetChildKeys #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add missing System.Formats.Tar docs #74786
    area-System.IO
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reuse shared invoker and throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
